statements: SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE is_fraud = True
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM UserBehaviorPatterns ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date, is_fraud FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE is_fraud = true GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM UserBehaviorPatterns WHERE transaction_amount > 10000 GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction FROM UserBehaviorPatterns GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_amount > 5000 ORDER BY latest_transaction DESC
SELECT * FROM user_behavior;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM user_behavior WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, transaction_timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'login' AND user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, transaction_amount FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY behavior_type;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, transaction_amount, transaction_timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE transaction_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, behavior_type, transaction_amount, transaction_timestamp FROM user_behavior JOIN fraud_detection ON user_behavior.user_id = fraud_detection.user_id WHERE detection_timestamp >= '2020-12-01' ORDER BY detection_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_details ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT source_user_id, destination_user_id, status FROM transaction_details WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE event_type = 'click' AND TIMESTAMP >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, fraud_flag FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, timestamp, event_type FROM user_behavior_patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency, status FROM transaction_details WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT user_id, transaction_id, event_type FROM user_behavior_patterns INNER JOIN transaction_details ON user_behavior_patterns.transaction_id = transaction_details.transaction_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, reason FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE fraud_flag = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT source_user_id, destination_user_id, amount, currency FROM transaction_details WHERE currency = 'USD' ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT email, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_accounts WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT user_id, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_accounts WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT email, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE detection_score > 0.5;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, user_id, account_balance FROM cryptocurrency_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY last_activity_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, action, log_date FROM account_activity_log WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_patterns;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_details ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, user_id, account_balance, last_activity_date FROM cryptocurrency_accounts WHERE account_balance > 10000;
SELECT log_id, account_id, user_id, action, log_date FROM account_activity_log WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, detection_result, fraud_score FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE fraud_score > 0.8;
